title: Field Remedy: 1507
subject: Battery - Cable at terminal loose

metadata.complaintGroup:
04 - Electrical failures,21 - Poor
Startability,24 - Wrong or not mounted

cause:
Disconnected Battery cable after storage not
tightened correctly.

remedyContent.text:
Check the battery terminals for correct tightening during PDI.
This operation is included in PDI since MY 2001,5.
